conbody.p: "Meta-Modeling Language" in short MML is the domain modeling language or the metamodel used by the Domain Designer. MML defines the business entities, their attributes and the relationships between them. The domain meta-model is defined using the Ecore meta-metamodel of the EMF Framework.

The domain model, its implementation code in java and its persistance logic can be found in the plugin project "com.odcgroup.mdf.ecore". Although the domain model is represented as Ecore objects in memory, the domain models are serialized to a more proprietory format and not to the "standard" XMI serialization that EMF uses.
